00029 void Menu::Base_event(ALLEGRO_EVENT event)
00030 {
00031         if(child)
00032         {
00033                 child->Base_event(event);
00034         }
00035         else
00036         {
00037                 if (event.type == ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00038                 {
00039                         if (event.keyboard.keycode == ALLEGRO_KEY_ESCAPE)
00040                         {
00041                                 if(parent)
00042                                         parent->Close_child();
00043                                 else
00044                                         game->Quit_game(); // AFAICT this is only done if you press esc
00045                                 return;                    // from the main menu, so you should quit.
00046                         }
00047                 }
00048                 game->Queue_game_event(Event(event));
00049         }
00050 }
00051

00055    return GAME_EVENT_NONE;

00079 int Menu_add_button(lua_State* state)
00080 {
00081 //      assert(lua_gettop(state) == 2);
00082 
00083         Menu* menu = static_cast<Menu*>(lua_touserdata(state, 1));
00084 
00085         int x = lua_tonumber(state, 2);
00086         int y = lua_tonumber(state, 3);
00087 
00088         menu->Add_button(Vector(x, y));
00089 
00090         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "[LUA] Menu_add_button\n");
00091 
00092         return 0;
00093 }

00097 {
